title: Don’t Fall For False Narratives # 1039 (Ep 1039)
description:
In this episode I address the troubling efforts by liberals and the media to pressure people into advancing false narratives in the aftermath of the El Paso and Dayton tragedies. I also address breaking news in the Spygate case that was not picked up by the mainstream media. 

News Picks:Wait, what? Peter Strzok is suing the FBI? 



This is a new low for the aggressive, out-of-control left. They’re posting the names of Trump donors now.



Secret texts emerge which show the international efforts to spy on the Trump campaign.



Is this airline recording its passengers?



New York Governor Cuomo speaks out about the water incidents with the NYPD.



Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
